title: No service on Sengkang and Punggol LRT due to power fault

updates.text: 23/12, 2.32pm: Sengkang/Punggol LRT full svc has resumed. Free bus rides have ceased. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.
23/12, 2.17pm: Sengkang/Punggol LRT full svc has resumed. Free bus rides still available at designated stops near the stns.
23/12, 2.04pm: No svc on Sengkang/Punggol LRT due to a power fault. Free bus rides available at designated stops near the stns.
